name: A Convenience Store in Japan
description: This was a small project I worked on after a 2 week trip to Japan, where I tried to make something about my experience there. I ended up recreating, from my own flawed memory, the convenience store we frequented in Tokyo, and filled it with thoughts I remembered having while I went to this familiar-yet-foreign space. There's no way to win, I like to think of this as an virtual sculpture or diorama.
